Entries.default: The dog watches as you approach, his ears forward and head cocked.
[Beckon the dog to come with you.]

He takes a few tentative steps forward and sniffs your hand.

He lowers his head under your fingers and looks up at you expectantly.

"I remember this little soldier! Glad to see you made it, friend." 

Maia kneels down to scratch the dog's ears. Ishiza hops closer and cocks his head.
He prances in place, wagging his tail happily as he looks at Maia.

He closes his eye and raises his head, helping you find just the right spot.

After several seconds of this, he stands and shakes himself off, ready to follow.

"Look at that! Must be working for the same company."

He grins at Maia.
"Uh oh. We got a ferocious beast watching us. And he looks like he's got a very itchy belly."
